sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya region kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Region' section par click karay aur aap 'Region' page par pohanch jaogay.
'Region' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.
Ek popup khulega jisme do fields hongi: 'Region Name' aur 'Status' dropdown (Active / Non-Active). Fields fill kar ke 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya area kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Area' section par click karay aur aap 'Area' page par aa jaogay.
'Area' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.

Ek popup khulega jisme teen fields hongi: 'Select Region' (dropdown), 'Area Name' (input), aur 'Status' (dropdown). Region select karay, area ka name likho, status choose karay aur 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya territory kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Territory' section par click karay aur aap 'Territory' page par aa jaogay.
'Territory' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.
Ek popup khulega jisme char fields hongi: 'Select Region', 'Select Area', 'Territory Name', aur 'Status'. Values select kar ke 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya town kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Town' section par click karay aur aap 'Town' page par aa jaogay.
'Town' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.

Ek popup khulega jisme teen fields hongi: 'Select Territory', 'Town Name', aur 'Status'. Territory select karay, town name likho (e.g., Peshawar1, Peshawar2), status choose karay aur 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya city kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'City' section par click karay aur aap 'City' page par aa jaogay.
'City' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.

Ek popup khulega jisme teen fields hongi: 'Select Territory', 'Town Name', aur 'Status'. Territory select karay, town name likho (e.g., Peshawar1, Peshawar2), status choose karay aur 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya distributor kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Distributor' section par click karay aur aap 'Distributor' page par aa jaogay.
'Distributor' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.

Ek popup khulega jisme 29 fields hongi, jaise: 'Select Region', 'Select Area', 'Select Territory', 'Distributor', 'Contact Person Name', 'FBR Title', 'Distributor Address', 'Province', 'Check-In Radius', aur 'GST Value'. Sab details fill kar ke 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya section kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Sections' option par click karay aur aap 'Sections' page par aa jaogay.
'Sections' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.
Ek popup khulega jisme fields hongi: 'Select Town', 'Section Name', aur 'Status'. Town select karay, section name likho (e.g., Bannu), status choose karay aur 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein naya sector kaise add karte hain.

steps.description: 'Sectors' option par click karay aur aap 'Sectors' page par aa jaogay.
'Sectors' page par top right corner mein '+' button par click karay.
Ek popup khulega jisme 5 fields hongi: 'Select Distributor', 'Select Town', 'Select Section', 'Select Sector', aur 'Status'. Sab fields fill kar ke 'Add' button par click karay.

sections.section_title: Distributor Zones ki details dekhnay ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein distributor kaise search karte hain.

steps.description: 'Distributor Zones' section par click karay aur aap 'Distributor Zones' page par aa jaogay.
Search bar mein distributor ka naam type karay aur 'Search' button par click karay.
Agar distributor exist karta hai to details show hongi, warna 'No distributor found' message show hoga.

sections.section_title: Region ki details dekhnay ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke system mein existing region kaise search karte hain.

steps.description: 'Region' section par click karay aur aap 'Region' page par aa jaogay.
Top left corner mein 'Search' field par click karay.
Region name type karay. Agar exist karega to list mein show hoga.

sections.section_title: Area ki Details Dekhne ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein bataya gaya hai ke existing area ko kaise search kiya jata hai.

steps.description: 'Area' section par click karein aur aap 'Area' page par pohanch jayenge.
Top left corner mein maujood 'Search' field par click karein.
Area ka naam type karein. Agar area exist karta hoga toh list mein show ho jayega.

sections.section_title: Territory ki Details Dekhne ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein aap ko bataya gaya hai ke existing territory ko kaise search karna hai.

steps.description: 'Territory' section par click karein taake aap 'Territory' page par navigate ho jaayein.
Top left corner mein 'Search' field par click karein.
Territory ka naam type karein. Agar woh mojood hoga toh foran list mein aa jayega.

sections.section_title: Town ki Details Dekhne ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein bataya gaya hai ke existing town ko kaise search kiya jata hai.

steps.description: 'Town' section par click karein aur aap 'Town' page par pohanch jayenge.
Top left corner mein mojood 'Search' field par click karein.
Town ka naam type karein. Agar record exist karega toh show ho jayega.

sections.section_title: City ki Details Dekhne ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein bataya gaya hai ke existing city ko kaise search kiya jata hai.

steps.description: 'City' section par click karein aur aap 'City' page par pohanch jayenge.
Top left corner mein mojood 'Search' field par click karein.
City ka naam type karein. Agar record exist karega toh show ho jayega.

sections.section_title: Distributor ki Details Dekhne ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein aap ko bataya gaya hai ke existing distributor ko kaise search karna hai.

steps.description: 'Distributor' section par click karein aur aap 'Distributor' page par chale jayenge.
Top left mein mojood 'Search' field par click karein.
Distributor ka naam type karein. Agar data mojood hoga toh foran show ho jayega.

sections.section_title: Section ki Details Dekhne ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein bataya gaya hai ke existing section ko kaise search kiya jata hai.

steps.description: 'Section' par click karein aur aap 'Section' page par navigate ho jayenge.
Top left corner mein maujood 'Search' field par click karein.
Section ka naam type karein. Agar woh available hoga toh list mein nazar aa jayega.

sections.section_title: Sector ki Details Dekhne ka tareeqa
sections.description: Is section mein aap ko guide kiya gaya hai ke existing sector ko kaise search karna hai.

steps.description: 'Sector' par click karein taake aap 'Sector' page par pohanch jaayein.
Top left corner mein mojood 'Search' field par click karein.
Sector ka naam type karein. Agar us sector ka record hoga toh list mein foran show ho jayega.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke Region page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Region' section par click karay, aur system aaphain 'Region' page par le jayega.
Ab aap 'Region' page par ho. Yahan apni requirement ke mutabiq sab explore kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke Area page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Area' section par click karay, aur aap seedha 'Area' page par pohanch jaoge.
Ab aap 'Area' page par ho. Yahan apni requirement ke mutabiq sab kuch explore kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke Territory page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Territory' section par click karay, aur page khud hi open ho jayega.
Ab aap 'Territory' page par ho. Yahan se aap saari cheezein explore kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke Town page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Town' section par click karay, aur aap 'Town' page par phonch ho jaoge.
Ab aap 'Town' page par ho. Yahan apni requirement ke mutabiq sab kuch explore kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke City page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'City' section par click karay, aur aap 'City' page par phonch ho jaoge.
Ab aap 'City' page par ho. Yahan apni requirement ke mutabiq sab kuch explore kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko guide kiya gaya hai ke Distributor page system mein kahan located hota hai.

steps.description: 'Distributor' section par click karay, aur aap 'Distributor' page par pohanch jaoge.
Ab aap 'Distributor' page par ho. Yahan sari details check kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke Sections page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Sections' par click karay aur aap seedha 'Sections' page par aa jaoge.
Ab aap 'Sections' page par ho. Yahan apni requirement ke mutabiq cheezein explore karay.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke Sector page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Sector' section par click karay, aur aap 'Sector' page par phonch jye gy .
Ab aap 'Sector' page par ha. Yahan apni zaroorat ke mutabiq sab kuch explore kar sakte ho.

sections.description: Is section mein user ko bataya gaya hai ke Distributor Zones page system mein kahan hota hai.

steps.description: 'Distributor Zones' section par click karay, aur aap 'Distributor Zones' page par pohanch jaoge.
Ab aap 'Distributor Zones' page par ho. Yahan apni requirement ke mutabiq sab kuch explore kar sakte ho.
